Actions.Text: COMMITTEE DISCHARGED AND COMMITTED TO RULES

Title: Relates to prevailing wage for those involved in hauling of concrete and asphalt
Summary: Relates to prevailing wage for those involved in hauling of concrete and asphalt in the counties of Nassau, Putnam, Suffolk, and Westchester, and in the city of New York.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the labor law, in relation to prevailing wage for those involved in the hauling of concrete and asphalt
